task.title: How to make pancakes
task.shortdesc: This task will explain what you need and what steps to take to make pancakes.

context.p: This recipe will keep breakfast classic with some old-fashioned pancakes.

You will need:
1 ½ cups all-purpose flour
3 ½ tsp baking powder
1 tsp salt
1 tbsp white sugar
1 ¼ cups milk
1 ¼ cups soymilk
1 egg
3 tbsp butter or margarine

step.cmd: In a large bowl, sift together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
Make a well in the center of the dry ingredients and pour in milk, egg, and melted butter. Mix this until smooth.
Heat an oiled griddle or pan over medium high heat. Pour ¼ cup of batter onto the griddle.
Brown the pancakes on both sides and serve hot.
